DC CODE ยง 8-1907

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor shall conduct an annual dangerous dog licensing drive in order to ensure compliance with the provisions of this chapter.
Within 180 days of October 18, 1988, the Mayor shall implement an educational campaign for the public on provisions of this chapter and existing laws concerning animal control.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Annual dangerous dog licensing drive; educational program.
